CustomField.formula: IF( AND( TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName )="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Individual"),"41000", IF( AND( TEXT(Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName)="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Foundation"),"42000", IF( AND( TEXT(Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName)="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Corporate"),"42500", IF( AND( TEXT(Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName)="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Other Institutional Giving"),"42200", IF( AND( TEXT(Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName)="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Government"),"43000", IF( AND( TEXT(Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName)="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Government Contract"),"49011",null))))))
CustomField.label: Revenue Natural Account
